name: Wasteland Courier
description:
Finish deliveries between the 4 cities at the edges of the wasteland. Beware, it is a dangerous place, filled with bandits preying on everyone.

Controls:

Forward / ReverseLeft / Right
Handbrake (Drift)
Navigate UI
Select UIKeyboardW / S
A / D
Space
W / SEnterGamepad (Xbox)
Triggers
Left Analog Stick
B
Left Analog Stick
A
